answers.answer: Not really. Your doctor might check your cervix but some doctors dont even check.
Most ppl only get another ultrasound if it's medically necessary.  I'm 36+6 today and getting one d/t having gestational diabetes.
I get one at 36 weeks just to check size of baby cos i have spd. This is baby no4 and ive always had between 3 and 4 scans for each pregnancy. I think its the norm now to have one at 36 weeks

question: What to expect? I guess they'll do another sonogram,  do they do anything else that's different than before?
title: 36th week appointment
